00026 QApplication &isis::qt4::QtApplication::getQApplication()
00027 {
00028     LOG_IF( not m_qapp, util::Debug, error ) << "The QApplication was not yet created, you should run init() before using getQApplication.";
00029     return *m_qapp;
00030 }
00031 bool isis::qt4::QtApplication::init( int &argc, char **argv, bool exitOnError )
00032 {
00033     if ( m_qapp ) {
00034         LOG( util::Debug, error ) << "The QApplication allready exists. This should not happen. I'll not touch it";
00035     } else {
00036         m_qapp.reset( new QApplication( argc, argv ) );
00037     }
00038 
00039     return util::Application::init( argc, argv, exitOnError );
00040 }

00053 bool isis::qt4::IOQtApplication::init( int &argc, char **argv, bool exitOnError )
00054 {
00055     if( m_qapp ) {
00056         LOG( util::Debug, error ) << "The QApplication allready exists. This should not happen. I'll not touch it";

00059     }

00065 boost::shared_ptr< isis::util::_internal::MessageHandlerBase > isis::qt4::IOQtApplication::getLogHandler( std::string /*module*/, isis::LogLevel level )const
